website_summaries.verdict: Despite some minor quirks, this heated jacket has a tough material and long battery life that make it capable of withstanding the cold.
pros: A rugged heated jacket that resists wind and moisture
Handy features include ample pockets, 3 heat settings, and reflective strips
Quickly heats, and runs at max heat for up to 6 hrs

customer_reviews.title: The zipper is too weak, collar is stiff, but it is warm and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the jacket only 5 times so far. It serves well when I am plowing in a semi-open tractor in the cold to keep me very warm. Today was the first time I wore it in my car, and I noticed that the zipper separated from the bottom and was very difficult to got back apart without damaging it. Once this happens, I become wary that it will happen more easily again until it is no longer any use at all. At the price and the brand name, this is unacceptable. My return window just closed on this purchase. I will be checking on the Bosch warranty next...
customer_reviews.author: davidjmcclelland

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice jacket. I am 6' 2" and the length of the arms and waist are great. I like the high collar on windy days! Heats up quickly and will heat at least 6-8 hours on low setting with a fully charged battery. The battery is small but a pretty heavy and noticeable when first put it on, but after a few minutes you forget its there. No wind gets though the fabric... I would recommend this jacket to others.
customer_reviews.author: OK

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to spoil yourself with a heated jacket
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to spoil yourself with a heated jacket. Very good way to stay warm. The battery lasts a few hours. There are three settings depending on how hot you want to be. I bought a spare battery to stay warm when out late. The heaters are fairly small areas on the chest and back. It would be nice to have some heat on the arms too. You can use the battery to charge a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J. Woltermann

customer_reviews.title: Holster breaks free. Happened on 2 coats
customer_reviews.text: This coat SEEMS like a good deal. It’s not. I used it maybe 10x before the cord that connects the battery to the coat broke free. It breaks so close to the holster that you can’t just splice the wires back together. Bosch took the coat in Feb and I got a refurbished one in July. I then used the refurbished one no more than 15x this winter and it happened AGAIN. My coat is now past warranty and they refuse to fix it. Huge waste of money. Just pay the extra and buy the Milwaukee one. Everyone i work with swears by it and I’ve never heard a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fain

customer_reviews.title: Heats almost instantly. Order 1 size larger then normal.
customer_reviews.text: Order 1 size larger then you normally wear I was expecting this to run a bit small so I did order larger then normal. It fits perfectly. That being said, after 30minutes of use my only complaint this far is it does not take care of my froze nose. Works great If I discover differently later I will update this.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: There sizing is way off. I got a 3xl because that size is to big for me and goes over a couple layers of clothes. This 3xl is skin tight when zipped and the zipper is on the left side?? Is this really a woman’s coat?? The first one they sent just came in a plastic bag. The second one at least came in the box with the charger and battery. Guess I’ll be sending this one back too and try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Must have jacket
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is a must have if you live anywhere with cold weather. Be sure to have extra batteries. The colder the weather, it will make the battery work harder to keep you warm. Note highest temp on jacket will also drain battery fast. I see it works best on low a medium for longer battery life
customer_reviews.author: Throwerboy1911

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: its a good jacket the heater worked good just the battery does not last very long about 6hrs if you work a 12hr shift.
customer_reviews.author: Bigman

customer_reviews.title: he liked it and said it was his the whole it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my dad for xmas, he liked it and said it was his the whole it , can’t fool a old man , he likes how it heats up and how nice the jacket looked
customer_reviews.author: Tjelliott

customer_reviews.title: Really does keep you warm.
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. He thanks me every day for it. He's a mechanic and is always on road calls. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Even without the heating elements this is still a very nice jacket. Longevity remains to be seen
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research on heated jackets prior to settling on the Bosch model. It came in yesterday, so I charged up the batteries and tested it out. Sitting on the deck with a cigar and a drink on a 40 degree night with extremely heavy fog, I was as toasty warm as could be. I had it on high to see how long a battery would last and got two hours out of it before it finally crapped out. Even without the heating elements this is still a very nice jacket. Longevity remains to be seen, as does seriously cold weather, but so far I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket- toasty warm
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6'0", 255lb. We purchased a 3xl. The jacket fits very well, not too big. He likes the position of the front pockets, he can slide his hands in easily and they are plenty deep. Jacket heats up quickly. Highly recommended. You can tell the heat setting low/med/high by the heat indicator color on the front chest of the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a satisfying experience.
customer_reviews.text: I requested a HEAT PRODUCING. It heats just a little for maximum two hours. Looks nice, well made...not looking for that! Battery is extremely difficult to extract from holster...every two hours, in order to recharge. What happens during recharge time? Order three additional batteries to complete a work day?? Not a satisfying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ina Marie

customer_reviews.title: This is perhaps the worse design flaw I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about this jacket that stated that the battery was difficult to remove from the holster. I decided to get the jacket anyway and those reviews were wrong. The battery is impossible to get in to the holster and damn near impossible to get out. This is perhaps the worse design flaw I have ever seen. And, it's inexcusable. Where was the testing and quality control at the factory? Anyway, don't don't don't don't don't buy this until the battery holster issue is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: crb77

customer_reviews.title: He says this coat is great because he keeps him warm in the frigid winter ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who works outside in the elements. He says this coat is great because he keeps him warm in the frigid winter weather. He says he has remedied it to coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D

customer_reviews.title: nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: first one i received had been open was disappointed but i sent in a replacement order and 2 days the new one was in and it was worth the wait works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: amazon fanatice

customer_reviews.title: the jacket is warm for how thin it is and I can move around easily in it while working
customer_reviews.text: I think mine is broke. I still cant figure out why it won't turn on. On a side note, the jacket is warm for how thin it is and I can move around easily in it while working..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So warm. So cozy. Need more battery life. doesn't last long on high
customer_reviews.author: aanamber

customer_reviews.title: I like this jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these jackets. The first one lasted 4 years. I replaced it with the same jacket and now have multiple batteries and chargers. THis is a very nice jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Martin

customer_reviews.title: My Husband is a HVAC tech and is outside fixing ...
customer_reviews.text: My Husband is a HVAC tech and is outside fixing machine he wears this under is work jacket!!! loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Hall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heats great but jacket is short so leaves your bum exposed.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Beware buying fitted items from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: The problem is the jacket runs small. I'm a 2x all day long but the sleeves and shoulders are restricting. So I would like to return it for a larger size but I purchased it for $100 and now the prices are a lot hire. So I'll just be returning this one and buying something similar from a local retailer so I can try it on and not worry about prices adjusting if I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this jacket. Very warm during our Chicago winters.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This jacket only stays warm for about 45 minutes on a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Russell W. Schell

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, size runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to receiving this jacket and it did not disappoint........until I tried it on. The jacket itself is awesome and the heat works great so far. The disappointment came when I put it on. I typically wear 2XL in jackets, sweatshirts and all other shirts, so based on the size chart, I ordered the 3XL jacket. It was tight! Very, very tight. Day 2: The disappointment continues. Hi heat is the only setting that I can feel. A fully charged battery only lasted 1 hour on hi. Not 1 hour and 30 minutes. Not 1 hour and 10 minutes. 1 hour. Only 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Ask Gary

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is exactly as described but the weather hasn't been cold enough yet for my husband to use the heating element.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: ... only gave 1 star because the sizing is SO bad for this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 1 star because the sizing is SO bad for this jacket. I purchased a 2XL because I knew this would be a layered item. It was so small, returned it and got the largest size, the replacement came, there was no battery pack (it had been an obvious return) and the jacket was again so small. The chest on a 3 XL was a metric 49. That is REALLY small. Please read the size chart before you buy, especially if it is for a big and tall guy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my husband at Christmas. He ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband at Christmas. He lived it and I want one now. The coat is light weight but turn on the heat and ur toasty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for about 2 weeks of use. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Was decent last year for the 7-8 times I wore it. Got one use out of it this year and it has a connection issue with the battery pack. Would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Great for my farming Dad
customer_reviews.text: My Father in law owns a farm in idaho and this was wonderful to keep him warm on cold days! Works great and fits well!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nichole Andazola-Getsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great product, price, delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas and he loves it. He had told me about one he saw in Home Depot that was a Milwaukee brand. Found that and the Bosch on Amazon. Both jackets looked very similar. The Bosch was on sale so I bought it. Free 2 day prime shipping. Fit and performance was perfect. Yay Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a Christmas present for my boyfriend ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my boyfriend. He loves it, the battery keeps its charge, and keeps him warm while he’s working outside!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Only worn a few times but love it. Looking forward to not standing out in the cold and freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: It is great for our winter motorcycle rides
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this coat! It is great for our winter motorcycle rides.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Asmussen

customer_reviews.title: great gadget
customer_reviews.text: love this jacket, warm by itself, great with heater, so you have a warm coat with out the bulk, plus you can always charge your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Monte699

customer_reviews.title: Best heated jacket on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best heated jacket on the market. I originally bought the Milwaukee and I returned it when I seen the difference in how much heat they produce Very comfortable , no need for bulky jackets anymore A+++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I ordered one thinking nice looking and heated but the controls never worked so I had them send me a replacement and the exact same thing don't waste your time or money on this product

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were more warming zones. Battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sam0

customer_reviews.title: My husband works outside and I bought this jacket for ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband works outside and I bought this jacket for him. He loves it! The jacket has high, medium, and low heat settings. He can also charge his cell phone with it. I would suggest buying a second battery if you will be outside for long periods. The battery works for 6 hours.

customer_reviews.title: Jacket was a Christmas present, he loves it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket was a Christmas present, he loves it. Will leave another feedback after he gets wear it with the heat on.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great coat! He loves it, very warm. Easy to adjust temp, nice fit.

customer_reviews.title: Jacket itself is very well insulated. Coupled with appropriate ...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket itself is very well insulated. Coupled with appropriate Carhart FORCE thermals, the jacket worked very well in 10-20 degree F conditions, without using the battery. Infact, have yet to use a full charge yet.
customer_reviews.author: William Eagar

customer_reviews.title: Don’t ware a backpack with this unit. It presses to close to your skin- so be careful. Better if you commute with a shoulder bag
customer_reviews.text: Battery needs to drain fully to maximize the life of the unit.

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket, works well
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket , works well. Not to good in the rain, leaks at armpits. Otherwise like it a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I get something warm when I wear the jacket I have to keep it on low

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat
customer_reviews.text: Fit is nortmal. If you wear a large, go with the large size. Heating is quick and strong. Works great and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Colantonio

customer_reviews.title: Used the jacket while shoveling snow, kept me warm ...
customer_reviews.text: Used the jacket while shoveling snow, kept me warm through the 4 hours of back breaking labor. Also suggest getting another battery, on average battery will last approximately 2 hours on high (red). Wish I bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... of these for Christmas gifts and recipients were very happy. May have to get myself one now
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for Christmas gifts and recipients were very happy. May have to get myself one now...

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back two, first battery connector, second zipper jammed. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortable and can hardly wait til
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this jacket. Fits comfortable and can hardly wait til winter
customer_reviews.author: Janie Nuci

customer_reviews.title: Instant comfort
customer_reviews.text: First, I'm 5'11" 180lbs, and I was VERY unsure about what size to order. I went with XL and it fits perfectly. Just long enough sleeves to cover my gloves and long enough bottom to be comfortable even when bending over. The jacket warms up SO FAST. I work for Red Bull ,and I'm ALWAYS either outside in the cold loading up, or inside a walk in cooler freezing my butt off and this jacket definitely keeps me warm. I'd recommend this jacket to anyone in the same field as me, or even other fields that are cold.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great coat!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice and comfortable coat. It keeps me good and warm even without the heat on.
customer_reviews.author: jhunter

customer_reviews.title: the outer jacket is great and fits well
customer_reviews.text: actually gets too warm need to wear less clothing beneath it. and that's when it is on low. overall, the outer jacket is great and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: christine biggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Whatever guy said that the battery is hard to come out must have hands weaker than their wive's hands. (or maybe they are just wimps) The battery has come out easy since the first time I had to remove it. Other than that, this jacket is awesome... it heats up fast and it stays warm even when it's turned off. The only thing I find annoying (And I think i may just be being picky) is that I can feel the battery through the jacket. But I usually don't like to carry anything except phone, wallet, and keys
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Viloria

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this jacket it gets super warm extremely fast not ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jacket it gets super warm extremely fast not only keeps u warm but feels great on my back during the long ride home from work it is made very well and it is one of the more stylish heated jackets on the market
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Williams

customer_reviews.title: The fits well and looks good. It's actually warm as is without even turning ...
customer_reviews.text: The fits well and looks good. It's actually warm as is without even turning on the heater but I've been swindled. I've used the heat only two times this past week and it keeps turning off. The connection to the battery is probably messed up or the jack from the compartment is faulty. Battery fully charged. I'd stick with Milwaukee.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Papadopoulos

customer_reviews.title: He just says its awesome and thanked me
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son who works outdoors. Its given me a level of peace of mind knowing he has another weapon to combat the frigid conditions he has to work in at times. He just says its awesome and thanked me. What more needs to be said?
customer_reviews.author: Ralph I.

customer_reviews.title: Control malfunction from start.
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected. As soon as battery was plugged in. Jacket started to heat. Unable to turn off via control button. Led was not on yet jacket was heating. Obviously broken from the get go. Functionality wise, its a very warm, well made fabric, water shedding jacket. But i will be returning it. On high it lasted about 2hrs. It does keep u warm. I tried it under my camo for bow hunting and it is very nice.. Just doesnt last long enough. Fabric is noisy but under a camo jacket deer did not know i drew my bow.
customer_reviews.author: chicagodiver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son-in-law for Christmas. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift for XMAS & my father in law loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: david chromey

customer_reviews.title: 3x size was more like a large or XL at most
customer_reviews.text: Returned item. 3x size was more like a large or XL at most.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because I liked the jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought in October tried it on and it worked. Hung it up in closet and didn't put it on until it got cold. Now it does not work. Disappointed because I liked the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: ed miga

customer_reviews.title: He is always cold so it works out great.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this jacket. He is always cold so it works out great.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my spouse ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my spouse. As she was going to use it today, we have disvovered that the 12 volt battery that was supposed to be included WAS NOT INCLUDED. Its very disappointing for a quality product to not include the most necessary piece. I will be contacting Amazon, or appropriate party to have this rectified.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F. Pawlowski

product_meta.title: Bosch Men's 12-Volt Max Lithium-Ion Soft Shell Heated Jacket Kit with 2.0Ah Battery, Charger and Holster PSJ120XXL-102
product_meta.description: Style:Jacket only| Size:2X-LargeThe Bosch PSJ120 12-Volt Max Heated Jacket is a high quality rain and wind resistant work jacket conveniently powered by the Bosch 12-Volt Max power tool battery system. Featuring three simple push-button heat settings - high, medium and low - the PSJ120 starts warming in seconds and is the perfect jobsite solution for the cold weather. Five (5) pockets, including a cell phone, large document, battery holster/controller and two hand pockets, make storage on the go quick and easy. With the included BHB120 and Bosch 12-Volt Max battery you not only can power the PSJ120, but can also power most USB port compatible personal electronics, such as cell phones, at the same time. You can have it all; warmth and back-up power. During the warm months, the BHB120 offers a convenient belt clip for use without your jacket simply as a power boost or back-up, anytime and anywhere with a Bosch 12-Volt Max battery. The PSJ120 kit includes: (1) PSJ120 12-Volt Max Heated Jacket, (1) BHB120 Battery Holster/Controller, (1) 12-Volt Battery, (1) Charger.
feature_bullets: High Quality: The PSJ120XXL-102 12V Max Heated Jacket Is Made of 100% Polyester. It Is Both Wind and Rain Resistant, Making It the Ideal Heated Jacket for Tough Outdoor Jobsites

QUICK WARMING: Featuring three quick-warming heat zones including two chest zones and one back zone, start warming in a matter of seconds. The three-level heat controller offers high heat (Red), medium (Green) and Low (Blue) for maximum control and comfort
EXTENDED RUNTIME: With up to 6 hours of heated maximum runtime with Bosch 12-Volt Max batteries on low setting, users can stay warmer for longer without needing to recharge
USB COMPATIBLE: The PSJ120XXL-102 heated jacket includes a USB charging option for most personal electronics such as cell phones while in the jacket pocket (5V/1A Max Output)
CONVENIENT: For the warmer months, The included BHB120 battery holster/controller offers a convenient belt clip for use without your jacket as a power boost or backup with a Bosch 12V Max battery

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
